LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays Knowledge articles associated with a case through CaseArticle relationships

property.name: recordId
property.label: Case Record ID
property.description: The case record ID. Use {!recordId} for dynamic record pages.

property.name: componentTitle
property.label: Component Title
property.description: The title displayed in the component header.

property.name: titleLevel
property.label: Title Typography Level
property.description: LWR typography level for the title.

property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon Name
property.description: SLDS icon name (e.g., standard:knowledge, custom:custom1, utility:knowledge_base).

property.name: initialLoadCount
property.label: Initial Load Count
property.description: Number of articles to display initially.

property.name: loadMoreCount
property.label: Load More Count
property.description: Number of additional articles to load when 'Load More' is clicked.
